attributes.action: Theresa May to resign and the immigration strictly controlled
attributes.additional_details:
Theresa May and her officials have shown a total lack of competence and utter disregard for not only the employment situation in this country but also the security of our borders.

The immigration issue is long overdue for a drastic overhaul and we call for a strict points only entry system and for the return to the countries of their origins of the failed asylum seekers and hate mongers such as Anjem Choudary who are a drain on the taxpayers of this country.

Only those able to support themselves and/or fill vacancies citizens of this country are not able to fill should be considered for entry.

Anyone who cannot abide by the laws of this land and respect our customs and culture should return from whence they came.
